about.title: About Me
about.text_1: I’m a front-end developer with several years of experience in web development, passionate about creating user-friendly and engaging web applications. I love diving into JavaScript, CSS, and frameworks like React and Next.js to bring innovative ideas to life. Recently, I’ve been focused on rebuilding websites and optimising performance, where I design reusable components and integrate APIs for enhanced user experiences.
about.text_2: When I’m not coding, you can often find me absorbed in a good book, solving puzzles, or planning my next travel adventure. I value curiosity and diligence in both my work and personal life, always seeking opportunities to learn and grow in the tech world.

modals.title: Modal Popup Examples
modals.button_label: Open a modal popup via button:
modals.link_text: Open a modal popup via clicking a link
modals.modal_text_1: The modal can be opened via both button and link, or potentially anything with a click handler.
modals.modal_text_2: This simple modal popup can contain other components, bespoke code, etc. This means it can also be used by other components, such as the Gallery Carousel, as it allows anything to be put inside it. The content of the modal determines its size.
modals.modal_text_3: It can be closed both with the cancel "x" button and by clicking anywhere on the screen off of the popup.
